scripts.setup: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.db:init: npm run db:migrate --prefix backend && node backend/dist/src/db/seed-positions.js && node backend/dist/src/db/seed-event-types.js
scripts.etl:all: npm run etl:matches --prefix backend && npm run etl:competitions --prefix backend && npm run etl:lineups --prefix backend && npm run etl:360 --prefix backend && npm run etl:events --prefix backend
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "blue,magenta" "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend
